title: The Spanish Helmet
description: Trailer - The Spanish HelmetA phone call between two friends unleashes a series of events which threaten to shatter New Zealand's officially accepted history.Prof. Matthew Cameron travels to New Zealand to investigate a remarkable archaeological discovery. But can he succeed in revising a nation's history, when the Government will stop at nothing to keep this secret? Matt is thrust into the role of student as he learns about trust, love, and deception.The Spanish Helmet weaves together the stories of two men whose destinies are set to collide; that of Francisco de Hoces - a Spanish explorer lost in the southern oceans in 1525 - and that of Matthew Cameron - the academic who is following a trail of elusive clues left behind in the wake of Francisco's fateful journey. The book is a plot-driven tale of a modern-day treasure hunt, one that is actively pursued by many amateur historians to this day.This novel is a meticulously researched conspiracy thriller which carefully blends fact and fiction. If you want to read more about some of the sources used in The Spanish Helmet, you can visit the (slowly growing) bibliography and explanation site at www.gregscowen.com
author: Greg Scowen
